overview: Randall S. Lieberman has more than 15 years experience in finance, sales and marketing. Prior to Apptricity, Lieberman led Apptricity’s initial institutional capital raise as a general partner with Quarry Venture Partners. Before Quarry, Lieberman was a partner with Vision Capital Partners and a vice president with Chase Securities Inc. (NYSE: JPM), where he structured and executed numerous merger, acquisition and project finance transactions in energy and real estate. His background also includes sales and marketing in the consumer packaged goods industry while at Nestle (ADR: NSRGY). He received his MBA from University of Texas at Austin and his BSM degree from Tulane University.

relationships.title: Chief Financial Officer & Executive Vice President Corporate Development
